#cloud-config

users:
 - name: appuser
   sudo: ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL
   home: /home/appuser
   shell: /bin/bash
   ssh_authorized_keys:
         ssh-rsa  ubuntu@de3-prj


package_update: true
package_upgrade: true


packages:
  - git
  - python3
  - python3-pip
  - curl
  - unzip
  - software-properties-common

byobu_default: system
